summary: An amateur cycling team from Albania heads to France to take part in a tournament only to discover on the way that revolution has broken out back home.
cast: Ndriçim Xhepa|Helidon Fino|Gentiano Hazizi|Oni Pustina|Vin Bejleri|Lulzim Zeqja|Petrit Malaj|Romir Zalla|Albana Sanxholli|Gezim Rudi|Denalda Teli|Valina Mucolli|Shkumbin Istrefi|Nela Lucic|Artur Selmani|Marko Bitraku|Sokol Angjeli|Irsa Demneri|Ermir Keta|Alert Celoaliaj|Pandi Toçe|Eri Hysaj|Jonidi Jorgji|Marin Orhanasi|Stefano Mangoni|Barbara De Gabrielis|Antonella Caron|Tiasa Dornik|Maurizio Zacchigna|Joseph Gambino|Federico Pieri|Dragana Bosnic Milenkovska|Muzbajdin Kamili-Muci|Vebi Kerimi|Nikola Kumev|Ahmet Jakupi|Osman Ahmeti|Elhame Bilal|Sefedin Nuredini|Salaetin Bilal|Becir Nuredini|Mendim Murtezi|Musa Isufi|Alessia Capelli
title: East, West, East: The Final Sprint
